sentences.en: "Do you like this colour, Victor?" she asked. "It is fine," said Vincent distantly.
sentences.cn: “维克托，你喜欢这颜色吗？”她问到。“不错，”文森特心不在焉地说。

sentences.en: After the game the victors returned in triumph.
sentences.cn: 比赛结束后，得胜者凯旋。

sentences.en: Halsey gave Victor Henry a jocular prod with two fingers.
sentences.cn: 海尔赛打趣地用两个手指戳了维克多·亨利一下.

sentences.en: He was declared the victor in the 11th round.
sentences.cn: 在第11回合中，他被宣布获胜。

sentences.en: I decided to install temporary SF, which made Victor nervous.
sentences.cn: 我决定安装临时的特种设备, 这使维克托感到紧张不安.

sentences.en: I place a high value on your goodwill, Victor.
sentences.cn: 我对你的善意估价很高, 维克托.

sentences.en: Later on, Victor from flat 10 called.
sentences.cn: 后来，10号公寓的维克托打来电话。

sentences.en: The calm eyes glowed in a way Victor Henry never forgot.
sentences.cn: 眼神镇静,目光炯炯,这副神色维克多·亨利永远也忘不了.

sentences.en: Victor Henry had never before had a clash of wills with Hopkins.
sentences.cn: 维克多?亨利以前从未违拗过霍普金斯的意愿.

sentences.en: Victor Henry lived through them in the Iowa's flag quarters.
sentences.cn: 维克多·享利当时在“衣阿华号 ” 旗舰司令室里,亲身经历了那些事情.

sentences.en: Victor Henry narrated his bomber adventure in a matter - of - fact way.
sentences.cn: 维克多·亨利实事求是地把他在轰炸机上的冒险经历叙述了一遍.

sentences.en: Victor Henry's skin prickled as he looked around.
sentences.cn: 维克多·亨利朝周围一看,不觉毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: Victor, in a word, got increasingly fed up.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，维克多越来越厌倦了。

sentences.en: Victor's finest achievement for MI 5 was securing succession.
sentences.cn: 维克托对军情5局的最大贡献是选定接班人.

sentences.en: Who was the victor of the boxing match?
sentences.cn: 谁是那场拳击赛的获胜者?

phrases.tran_cn: 维克多雨果（法国小说家）

trans.tran_en: the winner of a battle, game, competition etc
